Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Montana Palms Holiday Apartments in Mermaid Beach, you'll be near the beach and minutes from Putt Putt Golf Mermaid Beach and close to Jupiters Casino. This family-friendly apartment is within close proximity of Dracula's Queensland and Pacific Fair Shopping Centre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 23 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and dishwashers. Satellite programming along with DVD players are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include coffee/tea makers and washers/dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a spa tub. This apartment also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), tour/ticket assistance, and a picnic area.

Business, Other Amenities
Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is 9 AM
